thread.title: McDonald's Just Created a Limited-Edition Straw For Your Shamrock Shake
thread.title_full: McDonald's Just Created a Limited-Edition Straw For Your Shamrock Shake

author: Sarah Siegel
title: McDonald's Just Created a Limited-Edition Straw For Your Shamrock Shake
text:
McDonald's Just Created a Limited-Edition Straw For Your Shamrock Shake February 21, 2017 by Sarah Siegel 2 Shares 
McDonald's just announced that it's releasing a special, limited-edition milkshake straw, specifically designed for enjoying the company's new Chocolate Shamrock Shake . Getting your hands on a Suction Tube for Reverse Axial Withdrawal (or STRAW) might be a challenge since there were only 2,000 made. 
The J-shaped straw includes three holes so the drinker of the milkshake can enjoy both the chocolate and mint layers of the beverage in a single sip. These specialized items will only be available at certain locations at specific times, and McDonald's has released a list of how to get your very own STRAW. 
Read on to find out which location near you will have the high-tech straw available soon. Feb. 24 
1208 6th Ave., SE, Decatur, AL, at 10:45 a.m. 
California 
8660 Sierra College Blvd., Roseville, CA, at 6 p.m. 
410 Grand Ave., Arroyo Grande, CA, at 12 p.m.

1105 Northside Drive, Atlanta, GA, at 3 p.m.
